Uses of Filter in gnat.client
 

Fields in gnat.client with type parameters of type Filter
private  java.util.List<Filter> Run.filterPipeline
          Contains the filtering steps that will be invoked on the texts, typically in the order:
- named entity recognition (genes, species) with assignment of candidate IDs;
- loading of gene repository that has information on each candidate;
- filtering of false positives (non-gene names);
- disambiguation of remaining candidates.
 

Methods in gnat.client with parameters of type Filter
 void Run.addFilter(Filter filter)
          Adds a Filter to the processing pipeline, which will be invoked on Run.context, Run.textRepository, and Run.geneRepository.

Classes in gnat.client.ner that implement Filter
 class GeneNerFilter
          TODO not fully implemented yet !!!
Uses config/geneNerDictionaryServers.txt to determine NER servers at runtime.
 

Uses of Filter in gnat.filter
 

Classes in gnat.filter that implement Filter
 class DummyFilter
          A Filter that does nothing.
 class RunAdditionalFilters
          A Filter that can invoke several other Filters, specified at run time, to perform filtering steps on a Context, TextRepository, and GeneRepository.
 

Fields in gnat.filter with type parameters of type Filter
(package private)  java.util.List<Filter> RunAdditionalFilters.filters
           
 

Uses of Filter in gnat.filter.nei
 

Classes in gnat.filter.nei that implement Filter
 class AbbreviationFilter
          Tries to find long forms for short forms of gene names in a text.
 class AlignmentFilter
          Filter for recognized gene names based on the aligment score against candidate gene's synonyms.
 class DisambiguationFilter
          A disambiguation filter that picks among many candidate genes for a recognized gene name the one whose context fits best the context of the text.
 class GeneRepositoryLoader
          A filter that wraps GeneRepository loader methods, from GeneRepositoryFromDatabase and GeneFactory.
 class IdentifyAllFilter
          This filter "identifies" a gene name by forcing all remaining candidate IDs to be in the final prediction.
Gets all still unidentified gene names from the Context and sets each corresponding candidate ID as indentified.
 class ImmediateContextFilter
          Filters names by their immediate context (sentence).
 class LeftRightContextFilter
          Filters out names by looking at tokens to the left and right of it and comparing their occurrence against occurrences seen in a training set for TPs and FPs.
 class MultiSpeciesDisambiguationFilter
          Performs gene name disambiguation when genes of multiple species are sought.
 class NameValidationFilter
          Removes gene names that refer to families etc.
 class RecognizedEntityUnifier
          Merges recognized entities in a text to a single entity when they overlap or are adjacent to each other.
 class SimpleSpeciesDisambiguation
          A naive implementation of species disambiguation for gene names.

For each gene in a text, checks whether it occurs together with a species mention in the same sentence.
 class SpeciesValidationFilter
          Checks if the given gene is indeed discussed together (same sentence, same clause, ...) with the given species.

Input: gene ID, taxon ID, sentence, previous sentence, sentence0=title, sentence1=first sentence, abstract
Output: true or false...

Removes wrongly assigned gene IDs the candidate IDs of a RecognizedGeneName.
 class StopWordFilter
          This filter removes all recognized entities that use a stop word as their name.
 class StrictFPFilter
          Filters entities basesd on known false positives from a training set.
 class TfIdfFilter
          This filter removes all entities with a TF*IDF score below a threshold.
 class TfIdfFilterTest
          Only for testing!!! Example filter.
 class UnambiguousMatchFilter
          Identifies a recognized gene name if it has exactly one candidate ID (thus gene) assigned.
 class UnspecificNameFilter
          Also known as the CrazyRegExFilter.
 

Uses of Filter in gnat.filter.ner
 

Classes in gnat.filter.ner that implement Filter
 class AliBabaSpeciesNer
          Deprecated. 
 class DefaultSpeciesRecognitionFilter
          A filter that scans texts for species and assigns NCBI Taxonomy IDs; default implementation, scans for human, mouse, rat, and fruit fly only.
 class GnatServiceNer
          A filter that contacts an externally running GnatService to annotate text(s) with named entities.
 class GOFilter
          Adds GO code annotations to texts, loading each annotation from a relational database.
 class LinneausSpeciesServiceNer
          Contacts a running instance of LINNAEUS to annotate species.
 class RunDictionaries
          Filter that contacts local or remote DictionaryServers to perform NER.
 class RunGoDictionary
          Runs a local or remote Dictionary tagger for GeneOntology terms on each text.
Recognized GO codes are stored in each Text's ContextModel, with the model type GeneContextModel.CONTEXTTYPE_GOCODES.
 class SpeciesPostProcessing
          TODO Not fully implemented yet!!!


Handles post-processing of recognized species, currently tuned towards the AliBabaSpeciesNer: disambiguates species mentions ("cancer") and maps -based on heuristics- genera and families to most likely individual species or strains (for which then genes can be sought).
 

Uses of Filter in gnat.preprocessing
 

Classes in gnat.preprocessing that implement Filter
 class NameRangeExpander
          Rewrites name ranges in texts, for instance, replacing "freac-1 to freac-3" with "freac-1, freac-2, and freac-3".
